title: TU152 – Helping the Intense Child: The Nurtured Heart Approach REPLAY
description: In this episode replay, we’ll go over where many parents go wrong, what we can do instead, and how shifts in our strategies can revolutionize our households.  Learn the strategies of the Nurtured Heart Approach with expert guest, Elizabeth Sylvester.
itunes:subtitle: Techniques to add warmth in your home whether that includes kids or not
itunes:summary:
While this episode explicitly sends parents support during this stressful time, it is worth a listen (or re-listen) to learn more about adding love and warmth in your home with kids or without them.
Dr. Elizabeth Sylvester and Dr. Ann Kelley discuss practical ways to focus on the right things and ignore the wrong ones. It is a shot in the arm (pun intended ;) for extra protection and support right here, right now. Find more such resources for the child-free and for parents at www.therapistuncensored.com/episodes
itunes:author: Dr. Elizabeth Sylvester
itunes:title: Helping the Intense Child: The Nurtured Heart Approach REPLAY
